author: Matthew Mosk, Jay Bhatt
title: Trump touts saliva coronavirus tests after FDA emergency authorization
description: President Trump Tuesday touted a potential new way of testing for the coronavirus could be safer for suspected coronavirus patients and health care workers -- spit.
content:
In a Rose Garden briefing Tuesday President Donald Trump touted a potential new way of testing for the novel coronavirus could be safer for suspected coronavirus patients and health care workers and help alleviate the backlog in hard-hit cities -- spit.
